title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live Monday 4 December 2017 - BBC News
summary: taxi office fire treated as arson .
student block cladding removed after grenfell fire .
anger at coca-cola truck wait time .
woman injured in derby city centre attack .

text: reprieve for 'death row ' army dogs

text: monsoon warning before fatal boat crash

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's it for today 's live updates .
we 'll be back with more from 08:00 tomorrow .

documents.title: ex-church choirmaster jailed for sex abuse
text: ex-church choirmaster jailed for sex abuse

documents.title: weather : dry but cloudy night
text: it 'll be mostly dry tonight although there is the chance of drizzle under thicker cloud .
it 'll be quite cloudy tonight with some clear spells .
author: Alex Hamilton
BBC Weather

documents.title: jubilee square ice rink taking shape
text: looks like the ice rink in leicester 's jubilee square is coming along nicely - it 's due to open on saturday .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: teen 'tried to kill park-rape victim '
text: teen 'tried to kill park-rape victim '

documents.title: taxi office fire 'happened at worst possible time '
text: the owner of a derby taxi firm says he 's `` heartbroken '' after a suspected arson attack caused major damage to his offices in curzon street .
derbyshire police have appealed for information on the blaze , which broke out at pj cars at about 06:00 yesterday .
mudas ahmed said : `` i just could n't believe it .
it 's the busiest time of the year and our drivers rely on that spot .
`` the backroom 's totally finished and the flat above that has come down .
the only room left is the front room - it 's the only room that 's safe at the moment , everything else has gone . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: a46 to stay closed for repairs
text: you have been warned .
a reminder that the # a46 s/bound will remain closed this evening while we work hard to repair damage .
approx ' 1¾ miles of queuing traffic approaching the closure at # sixhills @ twitterid @ twitterid
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: shock closure for city centre bar
text: christmas party revellers are having to find a new venue for their festive drinks after the closure of a nottingham bar .
the bear and lace , on the corner of maid marian way and st james 's street , shut its doors at the end of november without warning .
author: Nottingham Post

documents.title: your photos : misty rutland
text: it 's been a bit foggy in rutland this afternoon .
pete took this photo near market overton .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: lengthy tailbacks after m1 crash
text: oh dear - highways england says there are three miles of queuing traffic on the m1 northbound up to j25 following a crash .
one lane closed in the roadworks , # m1 n/bound , j24a - j25 , due to a collision .
approx ' 3 miles of queuing traffic .
our traffic officers are on their way .
but expect delays .
was less than 2 minute in front of that looking at time must check rear dash cam tomorrow .
# tooclose
just checked phone , rang home 16:23 from shed jct 25 that was close
you again ? ?
checked dashcam , passed him in 4 lane sect .
he got blocked by artic jct24 offline put me in front by 45 seconds .
# close # very close
again
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: concern over lack of peregrine breeding activity
text: peregrine falcons have failed to breed in part of the peak district for the first time in more than 30 years .
a new report on birds of prey in national park shows there were eight peregrine pairs in the dark peak but no new chicks in 2017 .
the peak district national park authority said it was a `` real cause for concern '' although peregrine numbers in the white peak had improved .
the report also highlights a number of birds of prey persecution incidents .
author: Eric Simpson
BBC News Online

documents.title: firefighters finish putting out burning pile in hilton
text: firefighters have finished dealing with a pile of waste in hilton that 's been on fire for almost two weeks .

efforts to put out the blaze in sutton lane , which started on 22 november , have been hampered by difficult ground conditions and concerns about contaminated water run-off to the nearby hilton gravel pits , a designated site of special scientific interest .
bob curry , area manager for derbyshire fire and rescue service , said : `` firefighting has now ceased and we are in the process of handing the land back to the landowner .
`` i 'd like to thank everyone who has participated in the multi-agency response to this incident , and their efforts in coming together to resolve the incident as quickly as possible . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: victoria park attack : rape victim 'hit with paving slab '
text: a 17-year-old boy raped a woman in a park and left her for dead after using a paving slab to cause her `` truly dreadful '' head injuries , a court has heard .
leicester crown court was told the teenager attempted to kill the victim and dragged her into undergrowth , where she was found by a passing cyclist almost an hour later .

the boy , who can not be named because of his age , has admitted causing grievous bodily harm , two counts of rape , and stealing the victim 's handbag , but denies attempting to murder her in leicester 's victoria park on 3 july .

after showing the jury cctv of the defendant allegedly carrying a paving stone , mr aspden told the court the woman was walking through the park when the defendant appeared at her side , violently forced her to the ground and raped her .
he said : `` there was violence throughout .
he struck her repeatedly .
she was hit on the head at least twice with that heavy object that the defendant had brought with him for that very purpose .
`` as a result of those blows she suffered truly dreadful , life-threatening head injuries . ''
the trial continues .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: man , 25 , dies in ditch car crash
text: man , 25 , dies in ditch car crash

documents.title: rare 'holy grail ' of telephones found
text: a `` rare '' example of the `` first modern telephone '' has been uncovered at an antiques market .
a jade green general post office ( gpo ) telephone , dating back to 1934 , was brought to the market in market harborough and is set to be sold at auction later this month .
`` this is the holy grail of telephones , '' adrian rathbone , from hansons auctioneers said .
`` back in the 1930s , if you were affluent , a member of royalty or lucky enough to be a film star , you could apply to the gpo for a telephone in a colour other than standard black .
`` only three other colours were on offer - ivory , chinese red and jade green .
these were more expensive to make and incurred substantially increased rental fees .
`` they were a luxury few could afford in the depression era .
to have one was a statement of wealth '' .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: teenage cello star sheku to release first album
text: teenage cellist sheku kanneh-mason is to release his debut album in the new year .
inspiration will feature music performed by the nottingham musician with the city of birmingham symphony orchestra at two concerts in nottingham and birmingham .
it will include shostakovich 's cello concerto no.1 - the piece that helped the 18-year-old become the first black winner of the bbc young musician competition earlier this year .
the album 's due to be released on 26 january .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: footballers at hospital to hand out festive gifts
text: notts county tweets
| players and staff have arrived at queen 's medical centre in nottingham to deliver gifts donated by supporters .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: model railway club 's expansion plan hits buffers
text: a model railway club 's bid to try to expand into a neighbouring building has reached the end of the line .
the elizabethan railway society , based in sutton-in-ashfield , had hoped to takeover a building that was being vacated by st john ambulance .
but a clause in the charity 's lease meant the building had to be demolished and despite attempts by the railway club to stop the building being flattened , no resolution could be found .
`` we 've made our best efforts to take on that building but it has been unsuccessful , '' the club 's show organiser trevor peat said .
`` i always thought it was a long shot and this outcome was at the back of my mind . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: watch : high flying magpies looking to extend cup run
text: notts county are a side premier league teams will want to avoid in tonight 's fa cup third round draw , according to former republic of ireland international kevin kilbane .
the magpies , who are second in league two , made it through the third round with a 3-2 win over oxford city at meadow lane .
commenting on the work of notts manager kevin nolan , kilbane said : `` he 's doing a very , very good job . ''
county , along with the likes of leicester , nottingham forest , derby county and mansfield , will find out their opponents when the draw takes place at 19:00 this evening .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: public 'tricked into nominating election candidates '
text: a political activist from derby has gone on trial , accused of duping people into nominating local election candidates for the trade unionist and socialist coalition .
the tusc party stood in eight of derby 's electoral wards at the 2016 local elections .
to do that , their party agent , 59-year-old christopher fernandez of wingfield drive in chaddesden , had to collect dozens of nominating signatures from members of the public .
the prosecution says 80 % of the signatories believed they were signing a petition about the closure of moorways swimming pool .
mr fernandez has accepted two charges relating to false signatures , but has denied 14 other charges .
the trial continues .
author: Chris Doidge
BBC Radio Derby, political reporter

documents.title: oasis cover railway building becomes holiday home
text: this humble station in cromford features in a round-up of some of the most interesting railway stations in the uk .
why ?
it 's because it was used for the cover of oasis 's 1995 single some might say .
the stone building , situated on the now disused southbound platform , has been converted from a waiting room to a holiday cottage .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: vydra up for top player award
text: derby county 's matej vydra has been nominated for the championship player of the month award for november .
it comes after he scored five goals for the rams - including a hat-trick at middlesbrough .

he 's up against albert adomah ( aston villa ) , willy boly ( wolves ) , ivan cavaleiro ( wolves ) , barry douglas ( wolves ) and leon clarke ( sheffield united ) , with the winner announced on friday .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: man dead after car crashes into ditch
text: a man who was found in a car in a ditch in leicestershire this morning died at the scene , police have said .
officers were called to the a426 in dunton bassett at 07:43 and found the man inside the car .
a leicestershire police spokeswoman said : work is being carried out to establish the circumstances surrounding the incident .
the road is currently closed and is likely to be for a number of hours . ''
more details are expected to be revealed by the force later .
it was earlier reported that the ambulance service took someone to hospital suffering hypothermia .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: no charges for hales over nightclub trouble
text: england and notts batsman alex hales will not face criminal charges over an incident outside a nightclub in bristol in september and is available for selection , the england and wales cricket board says .
he had been with all-rounder ben stokes , who was arrested on sus of causing actual bodily harm .
hales , 28 , was not arrested but was interviewed under caution by police and was not considered for selection .
he could still be punished by the ecb , which has put its internal disciplinary process on hold until any criminal proceedings against stokes are concluded .
`` alex hales will now be considered for england selection , '' the ecb said in a statement .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: woman donates huge christmas tree to children 's hospital
text: a woman from duffield is donating a 30ft christmas tree she planted in her garden more than 40 years ago to a children 's hospital .
jean hunt , 84 , said she wanted to give something back to the royal derby hospital , where it 's based , as a thank you for giving her excellent treatment over the past few years .
the norwegian spruce was cut down this morning by a local tree surgeon who offered his services for free .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: armed robbers threaten pub staff
text: three masked men - one armed with a possible firearm - stole cash from a pub in oadby .
police said three men went into the cow and plough on gartree road at about 23:30 last night .
one of the men was carrying what was believed to be a gun - it 's thought the other two were also armed .
a man has been taken to hospital with injuries not believed to be life-threatening .
police deployed an armed response team to the scene .
two men , both aged 22 , have been arrested and remain in police custody .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: teenager kicked and robbed in park
text: a teenager was tripped to the ground , kicked by a group of men and had his phone stolen while walking through a park in derby .
police said the 19-year-old was attacked and robbed near mackworth road at about 18:00 on friday 17 november .
the victim said the robber and his friends fled after being shouted at by a passing dog walker .
details of the attack have only just been released by police .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: road to remain closed after cement mixer crash
text: police have said they do n't expect the a46 to reopen until tomorrow morning .
the road is closed southbound between the a6006 and a607 after two lorries and a cement mixer crashed .
07:00 -traffic incident -fosse way - we are currently dealing with a rtc on the southbound carriageway -near to seagrave -there will be some traffic disruption-please have patience .
10:57am traffic updatea46-seagrave - we have just been informed that the southbound carriageway is going to be shut until mid morning tomorrow at the earliest .
whilst surface repairs are carried out .
is this still the case or will the a46 southbound be open tomorrow morning , around 7am ?
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: ditch crash driver in hospital
text: a driver has been taken to hospital after crashing into a ditch off lutterworth road between cosby and dunton bassett .
the ambulance service told the bbc a call was received just after 8:00 this morning and a person was taken to the leicester royal infirmary .
the air ambulance was also sent to the scene of the crash .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: your comments : two hour queue for coca-cola truck
text: were you one of those that queued to see the coca cola lorry in mansfield ?
it seems to have sparked quite a debate on facebook .
penny glover said : `` has the world gone mad ?
two hours in the cold to see what amounts to a mobile advert for a product everyone knows about anyway . ''
emma leigh said : `` i love the coke truck and so do my kids or any trucks .
we go as a family and kids love it .
undefineddylan pavier said : `` rather them than me warm cosy pub anyone ? ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: thorne returns as rams climb table
text: george thorne made his first league start for derby county since may 2016 in their 1-0 win over burton albion on saturday .
the influential midfielder , who played 79 minutes , said his return had been `` a long time coming '' and he had felt very good physically before `` running out of steam '' late on .
the victory took the rams back into the play-off positions .
their next game is away at barnsley on saturday .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: driver taken to hospital after a46 crash
text: not the best photo but it gives you an idea of the crash police are dealing with on the a46 in leicestershire .
two hgvs and a cement mixer were involved in the collision just before the junction with seagrave at about 07:00 .
one driver has been taken to hospital in nottingham with a leg injury .
recovery is at the scene and arrangements are being made to clear the fuel spillage and repair damage to the central reservation .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: pie panic prompts 999 call
text: someone in nottinghamshire recently phoned 999 because they were worried about a pie that had been left cooking in their oven .
the call was highlighted by notts police as an example of the type of situation that should n't be phoned in to their emergency call handlers .
the force has a page on its website advising people of the most suitable way of reporting a wide range of scenarios .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: worcestershire switch for city council boss
text: derby city council has now confirmed the departure of chief executive paul robinson .
he 's leaving to take on the same role at worcestershire county council but is staying around until april .
leader ranjit banwait thanked mr robinson for his `` significant contribution '' in his 10 years with the council .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: santa paws is coming to town
text: here are some of the dogs from the best dressed category at this weekend 's nottinghamshire pugfest .
around 150 pugs and pug cross-breeds were at the event at oakridge arena , at collingham near newark .
organisers added they are looking forward to returning next year .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: crash closes scraptoft lane
text: a third road in leicestershire has been closed this morning because of a crash - this one is on the scraptoft/leicester border .
08:50 traffic incident scraptoft lane junction with bowhill grove -this road is closed due to a rtc .
please find an alternative route .
09:27 update scraptoft lane rtc - bowhill grove- has also had to be shut whilst we deal with this incident .
thank you for your patience .
update 1318hrs scraptoft lane closed between new romney cr and scraptoft rise with no entry from bowhill grove .
expected to be in place until at least 1600hrs .
please continue to find alternative routes and thank you for your patience .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: derby city council 's chief executive to leave
text: radio derby 's learned the boss of derby city council is leaving .
paul robinson , the chief executive , is understood to have taken a new job with another local authority .
he 's been in the post since january 2015 .
author: Wesley Mallin
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: road closed after car crashes into ditch
text: police have closed the a426 near dunton bassett - it 's believed a car came off the road and crashed into a ditch at some point overnight .
the fire service has reported ambulance crews were treating a casualty for suspected hypothermia .
08:46 - traffic incident a426 north of dunton bassett crossroads -road is currently closed whilst we deal with a rtc .
please avoid the area .
update 1315hrs - road is still closed and diversions in place until further notice on a426 between dunton bassett and cosby .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: family rescued from kinder scout mist
text: mountain rescuers spent almost three hours searching for a family who got lost in the mist at kinder scout at the weekend .
a total of 19 rescuers were involved in the hunt for two adults , three children and a dog who had called for help at about 16:30 on saturday .
mobile phone location technology was used to trace them to a spot near hayfield just before 19:30 and the family were escorted to safety .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: all lanes back open after m1 breakdown
text: some good news .
the broken down vehicle on the # m1 southbound closing 1 lane between j25 and j24a has been recovered .
all lanes open .
delays remain .
thanks .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: woman severely injured in derby city centre attack
text: a woman has suffered serious facial injuries in an assault in derby city centre , derbyshire police said .
officers said the woman was discovered by a passer-by in friary street at about 07:20 yesterday .
she had suffered severe injuries to her face , including several fractures .
witnesses have been asked to call 101 .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: town 'disgraced ' by loss of last bank
text: there 's anger among people living in bingham as the town prepares to lose its last bank .
the lloyds branch will close for good in may next year after a review found customers are using it less often .
this means there 'll be no banks in bingham , radcliffe on trent or cotgrave .
one person in the town called the decision `` a disgrace '' .
another said : `` when i came here 15 years ago we had a halifax , lloyds and natwest .
it 's a shame really . ''
lloyds is recommending customers use the post office in the town to do their banking or take cash out .
the bank has also said there will be a mobile branch , which will visit the area on certain dates .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: watch : two hour queue for coca cola truck
text: some people waited more than two hours to see the coca cola truck in mansfield yesterday .
just look at how long the queue was .
people travelled from as far away as stratford .
the truck is making 42 visits across the uk in the build up to christmas - later this week it will be in nottingham .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: your photos : december supermoon
text: it was the final supermoon of 2017 last night - so our weather watchers grabbed their cameras .
villager jim got a great shot of a plane passing the moon in eyam .
here 's a black and white snap by janice 's patch in wingerworth .
and a decent close-up shot by maggie t in east leake .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: student block cladding removed in wake of grenfell tragedy
text: work is due to start today to remove cladding on a student accommodation block in nottingham similar to that used on london 's grenfell tower .
byron house has been empty ever since it emerged it was covered in the material earlier this year .
nottingham trent university says the cladding will now be replaced with an aluminium alternative , with the work due to take about 30 weeks to complete .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: a46 closed for 'some time '
text: it looks like that lorry crash on the a46 is going to cause delays for some time yet .
07:00 -traffic incident -fosse way - we are currently dealing with a rtc on the southbound carriageway -near to seagrave -there will be some traffic disruption-please have patience .
07:49 the a46 at seagrave is likely to be closed southbound for some time while we deal with the earlier rtc .
please find an alternative route
10:50am traffic updatea46-seagrave -this road on the southbound side will remain closed until late afternoon whilst repairs to the road surface are carried out .
please avoid the area .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid hi , we do n't expect the a46 to open until tomorrow morning due to recovery and repair work required on the road .
@ twitterid are releasing trapped traffic from the rear of the incident .
thanks for your patience whilst we deal with this .
@ twitterid glad to hear , paul .
i am in que at the moment , when will we be released ?
any update ?
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: man 'pulls child away from mother '
text: a woman has reported a man trying to pull her child away from her as she walked along a footpath in loughborough .
the mother and her five-year-old son were between warwick way and braddon road on friday evening when a man pulled the boy away , leicestershire police said .
officers said the boy is `` safe and well '' but both he and his mother are shaken by what happened .
neighbourhood officers spent time in the area over the weekend `` offering reassurance '' to the local community .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: stopped driver 's insurance excuse falls flat
text: a driver stopped by police in long eaton yesterday claimed the only reason the vehicle was uninsured was because it was n't possible to buy car insurance on a sunday .
the excuse fell on deaf ears and the vehicle was confiscated .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: derby taxi office fire 'was started deliberately '
text: a fire at a taxi office in derby city centre yesterday is being treated as arson .
eight fire crews were called to the blaze at pj cars in curzon street at about 09:45 .
the street was cordoned off and a nearby church and restaurant were evacuated but nobody was injured .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC News

documents.title: travel : delays across the east midlands
text: travel : delays across the east midlands
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: alfie hewett ends 2017 with another title
text: alfie hewett has become the first british man to win the wheelchair tennis masters title .
the 19-year old from cantley beat his doubles partner gordon reid 6-3 , 6-2 in the final in loughborough .
hewett ends the year as the world number two .
he also won the french open singles title as well as doubles crowns as wimbledon and the us open alongside reid .
incredible way to finish an amazing 2017 .
nec singles masters champion 3 titles in 3 weeks , i could n't be prouder .
ca n't thank everybody enough for your support .
over the moon to finish the year on such a high , bring on 2018
amazing alfie so proud as fellow norfolkian , fan , and tennis fan ! ! ! ! !
merry christmas ! !
otbc
would love to come and watch you next year ! ! ! ! !
such an inspiration ! !
congrats from all @ twitterid alfie , great year and good luck for 2018
huge congratulations
you played so well .
aggression as well as accuracy along with your determination meant that you would win .
well done on a fantastic 2017 .
now you can thoroughly enjoy your birthday !
congratulations @ twitterid on your fantastic success in 2017 best wishes for more in 2018 .
that is awesome alfie , just so well done
simply superb !
well deserved alfie , all the hard work paid off mate .
good luck for next year
many congratulations alfie .
a fantastic 2017 all round
who 's the pride of anglia a real hero
a fantastic end to a fantastic year , huge congratulations !
bring on 2018
we completely agree & we cant wait for 2018 season to begin .
# tennis # wheelchairtennis
congrats alfie , well deserved mate !
congratulations @ twitterid see you at open in a week .
congratulations alfie on a brilliant year , your an inspiration to so many people i 'm sure .
you deserve every bit of success you get .
top man .
best of luck for 2018
congratulations alfie you 're such an inspiration to everyone
author: Chris Goreham
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: watch : today 's weather for the east midlands
text: here 's how monday looks .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: lorry crash closes a46
text: two lorries have crashed on the a46 near syston closing the road southbound between the the b676 and the a607 .
police and the fire service are on the scene .
# a46 in # leicestershire southbound between the # b676 and the # a607 near # syston remains closed due to a road traffic collision involving 2 lorries .
please see link for diversion .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid
any update ?
will trapped traffic be released ?
my wife and kids have been sitting there for nearly 2 hours .
trapped traffic is being turned from the back .
recovery is on scene however complex and is a confirmed spillage .
hoping to release trafic asap
thank you for the update .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: join us for today 's live coverage
text: morning east midlands - i hope you all had a lovely weekend .
i 'll be writing your live page today along with gavin bevis .
if you 'd like to get in touch with us you can send an email or use facebook or twitter .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News
